author: jfarrell
msg: THRIFT-1082: Thrift::FramedTransport sometimes calls close() on an undefined value
Fixes Thrift::FramedTransport module sometimes ends up calling the close() method on an undefined value inside its own close()

author: desruisseaux
msg: Field names shall be consistent with the ones used in other class having such kind of fields (namely: Loggings).
